title: Ricardo da Silveira Filho
text:
I am a brazilian biologist and data scientist, curious about all sort of things. Here I want to share same tips, ideas, and thoughts that come to my head with you all.
Feel yourself at home ^^

title: Drawing a star in R with ggplot
text:
I am a workers party supporter (PT, Partido dos Trabalhadores), with Lula as our candidate.



Figure 1. Lulinha peace and love.


With this being told, the PT flag is a white star in a red background, my plan is to draw this, showing all the steps to do it.
First of all, we will need to load ggplot2, the package that we will use in this session:

library(ggplot2)
